column4: hey guys, I'm on Ubuntu 9.10 on a virtual machine (virtualbox) on a mac 10.6 (snow leopard) host and I'm trying to share files from my host to Ubuntu. can someone help me out? I installed the guest addons and even restarted my virtual pc, but i just cant seem to get it to show up. mounting isn't working, either
i have rEFIT installed, but i can't boot on the live cd, when i start the "install without hurting your computer", the screen goes dark and it stops
